session.workspace
Class NonBlockingWorkspaceDriver

java.lang.Object
  session.workspace.WorkspaceDriver
      session.workspace.NonBlockingWorkspaceDriver

public class NonBlockingWorkspaceDriver
extends WorkspaceDriver

A Workspace Driver that implements non-blocking method invocations as the model of computation. In a non-blocking method invocation, the Link creates and returns a Datatype object result and invokes the remote method. The contents of result is not set before it is returned by the Link, which means the result.getContents() returns result. Upon completion of the remote method execution, the result of the remote method invocation is written in result, becoming available to the involker via the getContents method.

Author:
Ricardo Corrï¿½a (correa@lia.ufc.br)

Constructor Detail

NonBlockingWorkspaceDriver

public NonBlockingWorkspaceDriver(Middleware mw)
Creates a non-blocking workspace driver with a specified name and connected to a specified location driver. This location driver is used to performed the method invocations received by its links.
